title: Makina Integration Helpers List
description: Schema for lists of integration helpers for Makina

Version.description: The version of the list, used in change detection

major.description: The major version of the list. Must be incremented when helpers are removed from the list or helper addresses are changed.

minor.description: The minor version of the list. Must be incremented when helpers are added to the list.

patch.description: The patch version of the list. Must be incremented for any changes to the list.

HelperInfo.description: Metadata for a single helper in a helpers list

chainId.description: The chain ID of the EVM network where this helper is deployed

address.description: The checksummed address of the helper on the specified chain ID

name.description: The name of the helpers list

timestamp.description: The timestamp of this list version; i.e. when this immutable version of the list was created

helpers.description: The list of helpers included in the list
